title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a Federal income tax credit for the purchase of certain nonroad equipment.
content: Greener Gardens Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for 25, up to $1,000, of the cost of qualified nonroad equipment. Defines qualified nonroad equipment as equipment that is primarily used for lawn, garden, or forestry purposes and is powered by certain alternative and renewable power sources.
